channel.title: 法新社
channel.description: 这是一个追踪法新社news的种子

item.title: 极端抗议。@AFP的艾哈迈德-加拉布利（Ahmad Gharabli）拍摄了以色列警察试图驱赶在耶路撒冷抗议被征召入伍的极端东正教犹太男子。
item.description:
Ultra-protest.@AFP's Ahmad Gharabli photographs Israeli policemen trying to remove ultra-Orthodox Jewish men protesting in Jerusalem against their conscription into the armed forces.

As Israelis are called up to join the war in Gaza, anger is mounting at the ultra-Orthodox… pic.twitter.com/rTBNRaEwL9

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 19, 2024

item.title: #澳大利亚最高板球机构推迟了今年晚些时候对阵阿富汗的 T20 男子系列赛，称在塔利班统治的国家，妇女的处境是不可接受的。
item.description:
#BREAKING Australia's top cricket body postpones a T20s men's series against Afghanistan later this year, saying the situation for women in the Taliban-ruled country was not acceptable pic.twitter.com/Px0e583kkh

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 19, 2024

item.title: @AFP的伊德里斯-穆罕默德（Idrees Mohammed）拍摄了一名男子，他装扮成印度教神灵萨斯塔潘（Sasthappan），在印度索姆瓦佩特（Somwarpet）的穆塔帕-斯瓦米（Muthappa Swami）神庙举行的传统舞蹈节 "Teyyam"（又称 "Kaliyattam"）上表演。
item.description:
Dressed as a deity.@AFP's Idrees Mohammed photographs a man, dressed as the Hindu deity Sasthappan, performing during the traditional dance festival 'Theyyam' also known as 'Kaliyattam', at Muthappa Swami temple in Somwarpet, India pic.twitter.com/F1GJsK5Khu

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 19, 2024

item.title: 视频： 在阿富汗北部大草原上进行了几个世纪的国家马术运动 "布兹卡希"（buzkashi）是阿富汗的核心特征，它已从一种粗犷的乡村消遣演变成一种专业化的现象，并充满了......
item.description:
VIDEO: The pain and money behind the Afghan game of buzkashi.

Played for centuries in Afghanistan's northern steppes, the national equestrian sport buzkashi, at the heart of Afghan identity, has evolved from a rough, rural pastime to a professionalised phenomenon flush with… pic.twitter.com/k63DcfQOf1

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 19, 2024

item.title: 每 100 000 名居民中的医学毕业生#AFPG 根据 2022 年数据或最新数据绘制的经合组织国家医学毕业生比率比较图
item.description:
Medical graduates per 100,000 inhabitants#AFPGraphics chart comparing medical graduate ratios in OECD countries, according to 2022 data or latest available pic.twitter.com/FfdfSsolyJ

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 19, 2024

item.title: 菲律宾单身母亲玛丽-安-爱德华特（Mary Ann Eduarte）数年来一直推迟乳腺癌化疗，转而服用社交媒体上虚假宣传的食品补充剂来治疗这种致命疾病。但这些保健品并未奏效。Eduarte...
item.description:
Cancer patients falling for alternative 'cures'.

Filipino single mother Mary Ann Eduarte delayed chemotherapy for her breast cancer for several years and instead took food supplements falsely promoted on social media as cures for the deadly disease. They didn't work. Eduarte is… pic.twitter.com/603fZExpaD

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 19, 2024

item.title: 在希腊中部的加拉西迪镇，狂欢者参加传统的 "面粉战争"，纪念 "清洁星期一"。
item.description:
'Clean Monday'@AFP’s Aris Messinis photographs revellers taking part in the traditional 'Flour War' marking the 'Clean Monday' in the town of Galaxidi, central Greece.

The annual custom, which originated in the 19th century at the end of the carnival season, always falls on… pic.twitter.com/DyPFNenDtr

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 19, 2024

item.title: 视频： 智利律师贡萨洛-蒋（Gonzalo Chiang）和他的狗萨姆（Sam）在圣地亚哥市圣克里斯托瓦尔山（Cerro San Cristobal）的山路上散步，一边走一边收集塑料垃圾。
item.description:
VIDEO: A lawyer and his dog 'plog' to raise recycling awareness.

Chilean lawyer Gonzalo Chiang and his dog Sam walk the trails of Cerro San Cristobal in the city of Santiago, collecting mainly plastic waste as they go pic.twitter.com/YYIrJQlufv

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 19, 2024

item.title: 视频：班克斯壁画出现在北伦敦......人们从远近各地赶来观看出现在北伦敦的班克斯新壁画。现在，这位神秘的街头艺术家宣称，班克斯的最新作品位于一棵没有树叶的树后面。壁画中，一个人在条纹状的...
item.description:
VIDEO: Banksy mural appears in North London.

People come from near and far to see the new Banksy mural that has appeared in North London. Now claimed by the enigmatic street artist, Banksy’s latest work sits behind a leafless tree. The mural shows a person under streaks of… pic.twitter.com/oKFtQBEr0W

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 19, 2024

item.title: 美国总统乔-拜登警告以色列总理本雅明-内塔尼亚胡，在拉法发动地面进攻将是一个 "错误"。
item.description:
US President Joe Biden warned Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu that a ground offensive in Rafah would be a "mistake," as they spoke for the first time in a month amid growing tensions over the war in Gaza https://t.co/hyVI15IQLl pic.twitter.com/aXdhLSZT5A

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 18, 2024

item.title: 周一，当弗拉基米尔-普京总统在选举中毫无悬念地获胜一天后出现在舞台上时，聚集在莫斯科红场上的数千人发出了欢呼声。
item.description:
Thousands of people gathered on Moscow's Red Square on Monday roared when President Vladimir Putin appeared on a stage, a day after his victory in elections where he stood unchallenged https://t.co/c06U0AhPCd pic.twitter.com/rs5oO58oyM

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 18, 2024

item.title: 美国最具传奇色彩的杂志之一《体育画报》（Sports Illustrated）周一宣布了一项为期 10 年的新出版协议，结束了几个月来的徘徊不前的状态。
item.description:
Sports Illustrated, one of America's most storied magazines, saw an end to months of limbo Monday as a new 10-year publishing deal was announced https://t.co/bH3g1u81Xx

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 18, 2024

item.title: 冈比亚立法者周一投票决定将一项极具争议的法案推进到下一个议会阶段，该法案旨在取消自 2015 年起实施的切割女性生殖器官禁令。
item.description:
Gambian lawmakers voted on Monday to advance to the next parliamentary stage a highly controversial bill that seeks to lift a ban on female genital mutilation, which has been in place since 2015 https://t.co/7rqONnrOXE

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 18, 2024

item.title: 毕加索的出生地西班牙南部城市马拉加的毕加索博物馆将于本周二举办一场新的展览，该展览将根据主题而不是时期对毕加索的作品进行分类。
item.description:
The Picasso Museum in Malaga, the southern Spanish city where the artist was born, will open a new exhibition on Tuesday which groups his works according to theme instead of by period https://t.co/w7EDn3c0Gn

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 18, 2024

item.title: 阿根廷总统哈维尔-米莱（Javier Milei）成功地削减了这个饱受通胀之苦的南美国家的公共开支，但在这位自由主义者上任 100 天后，社会局势高度紧张，他仍在为通过自己的旗舰经济改革而奋斗。
item.description:
Argentina's President Javier Milei has succeeded in slashing public spending in the inflation-hit South American nation, but 100 days into the libertarian's tenure social tensions are high and he is still battling to pass his flagship economic reforms https://t.co/4OYJUTvge7 pic.twitter.com/QS0HJEGcvt

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 18, 2024

item.title: 总部设在卡塔尔的半岛电视台称，以色列军队殴打了其记者伊斯梅尔-阿尔古勒（Ismail Alghoul），此前他在袭击加沙最大医院时被捕。
item.description:
Qatar-based broadcaster Al Jazeera said Israeli forces had beaten its correspondent Ismail Alghoul following his arrest during a raid on Gaza's largest hospital https://t.co/hW2U8LqjkE pic.twitter.com/cxOdWGnbT0

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 18, 2024

item.title: 埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）在周一发布的一篇访谈中暗示，他使用药物对特斯拉投资者有益，称他服用处方氯胺酮来治疗自己的 "消极心态"。
item.description:
Elon Musk suggested his use of drugs benefits Tesla investors in an interview released Monday, saying he takes prescribed ketamine to treat his "negative frame of mind" https://t.co/Ui5tCxR9ld pic.twitter.com/rxZIQ7WYL7

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 18, 2024

item.title: 周一，在海地首都郊区的一个富人区发现了 14 具尸体，国际社会正加紧努力填补因数周帮派暴力事件而造成的政治真空。
item.description:
Fourteen bodies were found in an affluent suburb of Haiti's capital Monday, as international efforts accelerated to fill a political vacuum created by weeks of gang violence that has forced the impending departure of the prime minister https://t.co/ojF7SVWd3A

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 18, 2024

item.title: 深入阿富汗山区，经济拮据的矿工冒着死亡的危险来换取餐桌上的面包
item.description:
Delving deep into Afghanistan's mountains, economically desperate miners are risking death for the chance of putting bread on the table https://t.co/fmkd67C8Rg pic.twitter.com/RPVZXSyvmb

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 18, 2024

item.title: 罂粟是生产海洛因的关键原料，长期以来在缅甸崎岖的边境地区生长茂盛。
item.description:
Poppies, key to producing heroin, have long flourished in Myanmar's rugged borderlands.

After the military seized power in 2021, sparking social and economic turmoil, the cash crop has become even more important to some farmers struggling to get by https://t.co/4KxXeWSx2k pic.twitter.com/pcTPC13pXH

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 18, 2024

item.title: 在巴米扬省的一个斜坡边缘，选手们轮番从山坡上飞驰而下，欢呼雀跃，齐心协力让滑雪运动在阿富汗延续下去。
item.description:
From the edge of a slope in the province of Bamiyan, rivals cheer as they take turns to race down the mountainside, united in keeping skiing alive in Afghanistan https://t.co/F0lU6ZiABt pic.twitter.com/Z8qUaBSmRz

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 18, 2024

item.title: 气候谈判通常围绕减少最危险的温室气体--二氧化碳展开。
item.description:
Climate talks often revolve around reducing the most dangerous greenhouse gas, CO2.

But it's the powerful heat-trapping emissions from methane that will be in the crosshairs at a global forum in Geneva this week https://t.co/jSnCIgo4oI pic.twitter.com/4ay036yV2l

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 18, 2024

item.title: 即将卸任的总统麦基-萨勒（Macky Sall）通过大型公共和私人项目改变了塞内加尔的面貌，监督了工资水平的提高以及连接达喀尔和郊区的新列车。
item.description:
Outgoing President Macky Sall has changed the face of Senegal through major public and private projects, overseeing rising wages and a new train linking Dakar to its suburbs.

Yet many citizens feel left behind after his 12 years in office https://t.co/OFkVaumO70 pic.twitter.com/n4v4TW878g

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 18, 2024

item.title: 白宫表示，美国总统乔-拜登和以色列总理本雅明-内塔尼亚胡周一进行了通话，这是他们一个多月来的首次通话，因为以色列在加沙的进攻导致局势日益紧张。
item.description:
US President Joe Biden and Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu spoke Monday, the White House said, their first call in more than a month amid growing tensions over Israel's offensive in Gaza https://t.co/Jgq9GgYvuF pic.twitter.com/3zbC8ckt51

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 18, 2024

item.title: 一名摄影师在法国受审，他被指控强奸了在交友软件上以拍摄模特照片为诱饵的女性。
item.description:
A photographer is on trial in France, accused of raping women he lured on dating apps with promises of taking their picture for modelling shoots https://t.co/Jd7exKtjhy

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 18, 2024

item.title: 半个世纪前，两位名叫沃尔特-佩雷斯和阿图罗-佩雷斯的瘦弱兄弟开始在他们的尼加拉瓜农村小镇上举起石头，如今他们已成为当地的传奇人物和 TikTok 红人，被称为 "健美之祖"。
item.description:
A half-century ago, two skinny brothers named Walter and Arturo Perez started lifting stones in their rural Nicaraguan town.

Now they are local legends and TikTok sensations known as the "Bodybuilding Grandfathers" https://t.co/n0E72pceTb pic.twitter.com/OxYUHg4RAY

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 18, 2024

item.title: 他们的报酬是在世界上最好的餐厅用餐--但代价是必须在工作上对朋友撒谎。
item.description:
They are paid to eat in the best restaurants in the world — but the price is having to lie even to their friends about the job.

These are the secret agents of the Michelin Guide https://t.co/UgDjfpbiRX pic.twitter.com/LbP5iiAl4T

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 18, 2024

item.title: 在 "伊斯兰国 "的 "哈里发国 "垮台五年之后，数以万计与圣战分子有关联的妇女和儿童仍被美国支持的库尔德武装关押在充斥着虐待的叙利亚难民营中，而且似乎没有计划如何处置他们
item.description:
Five years after the fall of the Islamic State's "caliphate," tens of thousands of women and children linked to the jihadists are still being held by US-backed Kurdish forces in Syrian camps rife with abuse, with seemingly no plan of what to do with them https://t.co/bXhZV1F1ir pic.twitter.com/FIvDDvbnyE

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 18, 2024

item.title: 联合国巴勒斯坦难民机构负责人周一表示，以色列阻止他进入饱受战争蹂躏和围困的加沙地带。
item.description:
The head of the UN agency for Palestinian refugees said Monday Israel had blocked him from entering the war-torn and besieged Gaza Strip, where the UN has warned of impending famine https://t.co/RQOZKwGaHW pic.twitter.com/jdJxgbH4Rs

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 18, 2024

item.title: #在海地首都郊区的帮派暴力事件中发现 14 具尸体：法新社记者
item.description:
#BREAKING 14 bodies found in Haiti capital suburb amid gang violence: AFP correspondent pic.twitter.com/uiPHcDlZQ8

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 18, 2024
